data.name: AO3 Plain
data.description:
Plain white and grey AO3 skin + dark color schemes. Link colour and fonts may be customized.

May also be installed using AO3's site skin feature: adjust the additional settings to your liking and install it in Stylish first. Then copy and paste the CSS from Stylish when you make a new skin in AO3. Remember to disable the skin in Stylish when you're done. Keep the default "add on to archive skin" option under the advanced menu.

data.name: Tumblr Header Fix
eiowrhbbnv
Developer Chrome  by BamaBraves
Flickr by BamaBraves
NOS.nl - no ads, shows visited links.
data.description:
Gives already visited links a different color from unvisited links.

Removes the ad banner div from the NOS site.
data.css:
@-moz-document domain("nos.nl")
{

.ster-banner,
.usabilla_live_button_container
{
display: none !important;
}

div.article_block a:visited, /* In article links */
div[class*="contentBlock"] a:visited, /* In article links */
div.block__link.internallink a:visited span,
div[data-ssr-name*="TopStories"] li a:visited div, /* Top Stories */
div[data-ssr-name*="MoreArticles"] li a:visited div, /* Below article links */
div[class*="moreArticlesContainer"] li a:visited div, /* Below article links */
div[data-ssr-name*="LinkContainer"] li a:visited span, /* Bekijk ook */
div[class*="linkContainer"] li a:visited span, /* Bekijk ook */
div[class*="alsoSee"] li a:visited span, /* Bekijk ook */
div[data-ssr-name*="Subsites"] li a:visited, /* Subsites on main page */
div[class*="latestItems"] li a:visited h4, /* Collections */
li.list-subcategory__item a.link-block:visited, /* 3 articles per section bottom of main page */
li[class*="listItem"] a[class*="link"]:visited, /* Main page blocks */
li.list-featured__item a.link-block:visited,
li.list-latest__item a.link-block:visited,
li.list-items__item a.link-block:visited,
li.list-featured__item--half a.link-block:visited,
li.list-featured__item--large a.link-block:visited,
li.list-time__item a.link-block:visited,
div.article-collection-item a.link-block:visited,
a.subsites__article:visited

{
color: #888 !important;
}


}
